4 Installation

4.1 From the CD-ROM

1. Mount the CD-ROM on your CD-ROM drive.
2. Using Windows Explorer, go to the folder containing the MLWorks distribution.
3. Double-click on setup.exe.

The InstallShield application will now guide you through MLWorks installation.

MLWorks is now fully installed.

MLWorks 2.0 Installation Notes - 12 Aug 1998
